exercises.question: Translate to German: She loves me.
Translate to German: Ovi comes without you (informal).
Translate to German: We see him.
Translate to German: They know her.
Translate to German: I am calling them.
Translate to German: She plays with me.
Translate to German: I can give you (informal) tea.
Translate to German: We are talking to him.
Translate to German: They are helping her.
Translate to German: I am coming after you (formal).
Translate to German: Ovi plays with us.
Translate to German: Ankit cooks for you (plural informal).
Translate to German: I am waiting for you (informal).
Translate to German: She goes without us.
Translate to German: They work with him.
Translate to German: I am sorry.
Translate to German: How are you? (informal)
